Reviews.Title: “Good location and facilities for a budget hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel basic amenities expect budget hotel location close major historical attractions bad value night noise coming wall complained reception told receptionist hotels nearby noises noise advise carry earplugs hotel nice breakfast buffet olives cheese cherry juice downside staying hotel people breakfast socialise withi friend staying agora hostel nearby crowded breakfast morning travellers especially students socialise hotels breakfast empty

Reviews.Content: nice quiet location killer step lobby normal nice desk clerk nice breakfast roof stayed istanbul hotels compared terrible experience antik scam heaven earth beds uncomfortable

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: euskera
Reviews.Content: decided book hotel located reviews werent bad wouldnt luxurious reviews compensated kindness attention staff stayed hotel 4 nigths wasnt expected tiny clean lavatory sinking arrival try move towels morning breakfast short served called terrace obviously wasnt booked hotel website stay 4 nigths free transport airport pay day arrival expensive 30 euro staff barely spoke english tried help activities store hotel mind arriving heavy luggage

Reviews.Title: “Cosy practical hotel in picturesque street with smiles all round!!”

Reviews.Content: 9 adults brilliantly accommodated complete hotel istanbul strikes arrival smile friendly approach receptionist priceless sightseeing advice spoken english appreciated humour explanations walking distance attractions plenty restaurants vicinity decent clean breakfast plentiful rooftop view bosphorus town

Reviews.Content: hotel location amazing hotels nearby cost 3 4 times cost staff friendly helpful gushing downside close blue mosque hear call prayer 5am smell cats pee didnt book hotel

Reviews.Title: “Incredible loaction with a friendly and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: iliah
Reviews.Content: cozy hotel location near historical sights five minutes walking distance perfect breakfast overlooking incredible view comfortable bring pieces luggage air conditioning quiet powerful showers clean brand bad hotel complain hotels book instead hotel hotels exactly maybe nicer foyer cost twice bring attention murat coworker reception desk fantastic job helping enjoy time adn helpful rate hotel 5 stars 5

Reviews.Title: “OK if your first few choices are full”

Reviews.Content: stayed night booking travel agency desk staff friendly clean tiny bathroom practically top bed bed filled little space walk bed bag looked train tracks breakfast surprised list price 120 euros paid package travel agency pay directly worth particularly saturated hotels spacious view found price

Reviews.Title: “A hotel that gains a lot from its location and staff”
Reviews.Author: Vamar1
Reviews.Content: location helpful staff sent hotel email hotel reception manager responded immediately describing options getting including metrotram terms location minutes walk blue mosque tram train station carry heavy luggage youd taking taxishuttle arranged hotel excellent sea view upper floor breakfast
